title: Export Metadata
description: Metadata about the data export including export date and counts

export_date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the export was generated

total_users.description: Total number of users in the export

total_countries.description: Total number of countries in the export

version.description: Export version identifier (semantic version or date format)

export_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the export was generated

api_compat_min.description: Minimum API version required for compatibility

data_schema_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the datamart schema for change detection
